TopicTitle: (WIP) Venus Program: Colonizing Eve (Venus 5 Coming Soon!)

Articles.Content:
Missions:

Venus 1: atmospheric probe, lander, studied atmosphere on descent and took scientific readings, sent back to Mission Control.

Outcome: Failure (camera melted on re-entry, ran out of power before landing.)

Venus 2: Manned lander, took samples from soil, did an EVA and planted a flag. Did not have a camera, so no pics or video either.

Outcome: Success!

Venus 3: Communications satellite probe, orbiting at 100km.

Outcome: Success! pics at http://imgur.com/a/sfNY0

Venus 4: Manned space station and refueling depot.

Outcome: Success! (no cameras, so no pics.)

Venus 5: Manned lander and return vehicle.

Outcome: Abandoned. Never will be launched.

Edited November 5, 2013 by Sun
